plan.plan_title: Slow Ticket Scanning at M. Chinnaswamy Gates

steps.details: Add manual scanning stations and staff to accelerate entry throughput.
Set up controlled, roped queues to manage fan flow and prevent bunching.
Display expected wait times and direct fans to less-busy gates.
Notify metro and bus operators of gate issues to stagger arrivals.
Place first-aid units near gates for crowd-related incidents.

plan.plan_title: Innings Break Surge at Cubbon Park & MG Road Stations

steps.details: Implement one-way passenger flow patterns at stations to reduce cross-traffic and bottlenecks.
BMRCL to prepare additional staff and rolling stock to handle mid-game spikes.
Deploy BMTC buses at nearby stops to assist with dispersal.
Station marshals to manage platform queues and prevent platform edge overcrowding.
Announce expected congestion windows and advise fans on staggered departures.

plan.plan_title: Post-match Dispersal Gridlock Around Stadium Loop

steps.details: Remove illegal parking immediately to regain lane capacity for dispersal.
Open staggered exit schedules and direct fans to different transport nodes to distribute load.
Provide dedicated match-time shuttle buses to key transit hubs to reduce private vehicle demand.
Position officers at choke points to manage merging flows and prevent gridlock.
Maintain open corridors for ambulances and fire services during high-density egress.
